entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
